content: Seventh cabinet of Singapore formed by Prime Minister Lee Kuan Yew in 1985This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Seventh Lee Kuan Yew Cabinet" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(January 2021)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* The **Seventh Lee Kuan Yew Cabinet** is the seventh [Cabinet of Singapore](/wiki/Cabinet_of_Singapore) formed by Prime Minister [Lee Kuan Yew](/wiki/Lee_Kuan_Yew). It was formed in 1985 after the [1984 Singaporean general election](/wiki/1984_Singaporean_general_election). ## Cabinet The Seventh Lee Kuan Yew Cabinet consisted of the following members.
